sql-descriptor.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN, MTDG_APPL_DATE) COMD_SEQ ,MTCD_COME_CODE AS COMD_COME_CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME AS COMD_METH_NAME ,MTCD_METH_GUBN AS COMD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_INDS_CODE AS COMD_INDS_CODE ,MTCD_MATL_CLAS AS COMD_MATL_CLAS ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0 AS COMD_SORT_KEY0 ,MTDG_REGT_NO AS COMD_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE AS COMD_REVI_DATE ,MTCD_METH_GUBN AS COMD_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_APPL_DATE AS COMD_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE AS COMD_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN AS COMD_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_STND_DEGR AS COMD_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT AS COMD_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE AS COMD_STND_FILE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR AS COMD_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_APPL_YN AS COMD_APPL_YN ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 AS COMD_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 AS COMD_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 AS COMD_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 AS COMD_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID AS COMD_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH AS COMD_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN AS COMD_INIT_CMAN ,CRFT_USER_EMPL_NAME(MTDG_INIT_CMAN) COMD_INIT_NAME ,MTDG_INIT_DATE AS COMD_INIT_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(E.ATT_SEQ) AS FILE_CNT FROM ESAATTH E WHERE E.STS <> 'D' AND E.SYS_ID = #sys_id# AND E.GRP_CD = MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD) AS FILE_CNT ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD AS COMD_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR AS COMD_TRAN_DEGR ,MTCD_DOCU_NUMB AS COMD_DOCU_NUMB ,(SELECT LISTAGG(REM , ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY SORT_ORD) FROM ESACDDT A WHERE GRP_CD = 'PROC' || MTDG_COME_CODE AND DTL_CD LIKE CASE WHEN INSTR(MTDG_STND_DEGR,'-') > 0 THEN SUBSTRING(MTDG_STND_DEGR,1,INSTR(MTDG_STND_DEGR,'-')-1) || LPAD(SUBSTRING(MTDG_STND_DEGR,INSTR(MTDG_STND_DEGR,'-')+1),2,'0') ELSE LPAD(MTDG_STND_DEGR,2,'0') || '00' END || '%' ) PROC_NAME_X0831 ,MTDG_MODL_NAME PROC_NAME ,NULL AS PROC_MODE ,C.* FROM CITBMTCD B LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTDG C ON MTCD_CORP_CODE = MTDG_CORP_CODE AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = MTDG_METH_GUBN AND MTCD_COME_CODE = MTDG_COME_CODE WHERE MTCD_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# [AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = #mtcd_meth_gubn#] AND MTCD_COME_CODE = NVL(#mtcd_come_code#, MTCD_COME_CODE) [AND MTCD_METH_NAME LIKE '%'||#mtcd_meth_name#||'%'] [AND MTDG_STND_DEGR LIKE #mtdg_stnd_degr#||'%'] AND MTDG_APPL_DATE <= #cur_date# @sql@ ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN, MTCD_SORT_KEY0, MTDG_APPL_DATE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM ESAAURP WHERE USR_ID =#reg_id# AND ROLE_CD ='M10'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN, MTCD_SORT_KEY0) COMD_SEQ ,MTCD_COME_CODE AS COMD_COME_CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME AS COMD_METH_NAME ,MTCD_METH_GUBN AS COMD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_INDS_CODE AS COMD_INDS_CODE ,MTCD_MATL_CLAS AS COMD_MATL_CLAS ,MTDG_REGT_NO AS COMD_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE AS COMD_REVI_DATE ,MTDG_METH_GUBN AS COMD_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_APPL_DATE AS COMD_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE AS COMD_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN AS COMD_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_STND_DEGR AS COMD_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT AS COMD_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE AS COMD_STND_FILE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR AS COMD_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_APPL_YN AS COMD_APPL_YN ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 AS COMD_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 AS COMD_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 AS COMD_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 AS COMD_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID AS COMD_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH AS COMD_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN AS COMD_INIT_CMAN ,CRFT_USER_EMPL_NAME(MTDG_INIT_CMAN) COMD_INIT_NAME ,MTDG_INIT_DATE AS COMD_INIT_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(E.ATT_SEQ) AS FILE_CNT FROM ESAATTH E WHERE E.STS <> 'D' AND E.SYS_ID = #sys_id# AND E.GRP_CD = MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD) AS FILE_CNT ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD AS COMD_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR AS COMD_TRAN_DEGR ,MTCD_DOCU_NUMB AS COMD_DOCU_NUMB ,MTDG_MCHH_DATE FROM CITBMTDG LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTCD ON MTCD_CORP_CODE = MTDG_CORP_CODE AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = MTDG_METH_GUBN AND MTCD_COME_CODE = MTDG_COME_CODE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MTCD_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# [AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = #mtcd_meth_gubn#] AND MTCD_COME_CODE = NVL(#mtcd_come_code#, MTCD_COME_CODE) [AND MTCD_METH_NAME LIKE '%'||#mtcd_meth_name#||'%'] [AND MTDG_STND_DEGR LIKE #mtdg_stnd_degr#||'%'] AND (MTDG_COME_CODE, MTDG_APPL_DATE) IN (SELECT MTDG_COME_CODE ,MAX(A.MTDG_APPL_DATE) FROM CITBMTDG A WHERE A.MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND A.MTDG_APPL_DATE <= #cur_date# GROUP BY MTDG_COME_CODE ) ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN, MTCD_SORT_KEY0, MTDG_STND_DEGR ASC

INSERT INTO CITBMTCD (MTCD_CORP_CODE ,MTCD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_COME_CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME ,MTCD_INDS_CODE ,MTCD_MATL_CLAS ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0 ,MTCD_UPDT_DATE ,MTCD_UPDT_CMAN ,MTCD_INIT_DATE ,MTCD_INIT_CMAN ,MTCD_DOCU_NUMB ) VALUES ( #corp_cd# ,#comd_meth_gubn# ,#comd_come_code# ,#comd_meth_name# ,#comd_inds_code# ,#comd_matl_clas# ,NULL ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ,#reg_id# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ,#reg_id# ,#comd_docu_numb# )

INSERT INTO CITBMTDG (MTDG_CORP_CODE ,MTDG_METH_GUBN ,MTDG_COME_CODE ,MTDG_STND_DEGR ,MTDG_REGT_NO ,MTDG_REVI_DATE ,MTDG_APPL_DATE ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT ,MTDG_STND_FILE ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 ,MTDG_MENU_ID ,MTDG_MXML_PATH ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD ,MTDG_APPL_YN ,MTDG_UPDT_DATE ,MTDG_UPDT_CMAN ,MTDG_INIT_DATE ,MTDG_INIT_CMAN ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR ,MTDG_MCHH_DATE ) VALUES ( #corp_cd# ,#comd_meth_gubn# ,#comd_come_code# ,#comd_stnd_degr# ,#comd_regt_no# ,#comd_revi_date# ,#comd_appl_date# ,#comd_hkmc_degr# ,#comd_degr_cont# ,#comd_stnd_file# ,#comd_stnd_man1# ,#comd_phon_no1# ,#comd_stnd_man2# ,#comd_phon_no2# ,#comd_menu_id# ,#comd_mxml_path# ,#comdatt# ,#comd_appl_yn# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ,#reg_id# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') ,#reg_id# ,#comd_tran_degr# ,#mtdg_mchh_date# )

BEGIN UPDATE CITBMTCD SET MTCD_METH_NAME = #comd_meth_name# ,MTCD_DOCU_NUMB = #comd_docu_numb# ,MTCD_INDS_CODE = #comd_inds_code# ,MTCD_MATL_CLAS = #comd_matl_clas# WHERE MTCD_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTCD_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code# ;
UPDATE CITBMTDG SET MTDG_REGT_NO = #comd_regt_no# ,MTDG_REVI_DATE = #comd_revi_date# ,MTDG_APPL_DATE = #comd_appl_date# ,MTDG_HKMC_DEGR = #comd_hkmc_degr# ,MTDG_DEGR_CONT = #comd_degr_cont# ,MTDG_STND_FILE = #comd_stnd_file# ,MTDG_STND_MAN1 = #comd_stnd_man1# ,MTDG_PHON_NO1 = #comd_phon_no1# ,MTDG_STND_MAN2 = #comd_stnd_man2# ,MTDG_PHON_NO2 = #comd_phon_no2# ,MTDG_MENU_ID = #comd_menu_id# ,MTDG_MXML_PATH = #comd_mxml_path# ,MTDG_APPL_YN = #comd_appl_yn# ,MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD= #comdatt# ,MTDG_TRAN_DEGR = #comd_tran_degr# ,MTDG_MCHH_DATE = #mtdg_mchh_date# WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #comd_stnd_degr# ; END;
BEGIN DELETE FROM CITBMTDG WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #comd_stnd_degr# ; END;

SELECT DISTINCT MTCD_COME_CODE CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME LABEL ,MTCD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0 FROM CITBMTDG LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBMTCD ON MTCD_CORP_CODE = MTDG_CORP_CODE AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = MTDG_METH_GUBN AND MTCD_COME_CODE = MTDG_COME_CODE WHERE MTCD_METH_GUBN = #mtcd_meth_gubn# ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0
SELECT MTCD_COME_CODE AS DATA ,MTCD_METH_NAME AS LABEL FROM CITBMTCD ORDER BY MTCD_METH_GUBN ,MTCD_SORT_KEY0

SELECT COMD_COME_CODE ,COMD_COME_NAME ,COMD_TABL_ID ,COMD_SORT_NUMB ,COMD_TABL_NAME FROM ( SELECT PKMS_COME_CODE AS COMD_COME_CODE ,MTCD_METH_NAME COMD_COME_NAME ,PKMS_TABL_ID AS COMD_TABL_ID ,PKMS_SORT_NUMB AS COMD_SORT_NUMB ,PKMS_TABL_NAME AS COMD_TABL_NAME FROM CITBPKMS,CITBMTCD WHERE PKMS_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND PKMS_CORP_CODE = MTCD_CORP_CODE(+) AND PKMS_COME_CODE =MTCD_COME_CODE(+) [AND PKMS_COME_CODE = #mtcd_come_code#] @sql1@ @sql2@ ) A ORDER BY A.COMD_COME_CODE ,A.COMD_SORT_NUMB

SELECT PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,CASE WHEN PKCL_COLM_ALGN = 'C' THEN 'center' WHEN PKCL_COLM_ALGN = 'R' THEN 'right' WHEN PKCL_COLM_ALGN = 'L' THEN 'left' ELSE '' END PKCL_TEXT_ALIGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ,CRFT_USER_EMPL_NAME(PKCL_INIT_CMAN) COMD_INIT_NAME FROM CITBPKCL WHERE 1=1 [AND PKCL_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code#] [AND PKCL_TABL_ID = #comd_tabl_id#] ORDER BY PKCL_SORT_NUMB
SELECT * FROM @table_id@ WHERE 1=1 [AND CMPK_GUBN_CODE LIKE #come_code# || '%'] [AND @column_id@_STND_DEGR = #stnd_degr#] @order_str@
SELECT * FROM @comd_table_id@ WHERE 1=1 [AND CMPK_GUBN_CODE LIKE #comd_come_code# || '%']
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM CITBMTCD WHERE MTCD_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTCD_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTCD_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code#
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM CITBMTDG WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #comd_stnd_degr#
SELECT MTDG_STND_DEGR CODE ,MTDG_STND_DEGR CODE_NAME FROM CITBMTDG WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #mtcd_come_code# ORDER BY MTDG_APPL_DATE

UPDATE CITBMTDG SET MTDG_ATT_GRP_CD = #comd_att_grp_cd# WHERE MTDG_CORP_CODE = #corp_cd# AND MTDG_METH_GUBN = #comd_meth_gubn# AND MTDG_COME_CODE = #comd_come_code# AND MTDG_STND_DEGR = #comd_stnd_degr#

WITH T1 ( PROPERTY ,COL ) AS ( SELECT 'dataField' , 'data_field' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'headerText', 'header_text' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'width' , 'width' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'textAlign' , 'text_align' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1

WITH T1 ( SEQ ,DATA_FIELD ,HEADER_TEXT ,WIDTH ,TEXT_ALIGN ) AS ( SELECT 1,'comd_come_code','공법코드',60,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2,'comd_tabl_id','TABLE ID',100,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3,'comd_tabl_name','TABLE 명',200,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4,'comd_sort_numb','순서',50,'right' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5,'comd_updt_date','수정일',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6,'comd_init_name','등록자',60,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7,'comd_corp_code','법인코드',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8,'created_yn','생성여부',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9,'desc_yn','DESC',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10,'cnt_col','컬럼수',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11,'cnt_col_desc','DESC CNT',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12,'mgt_yn','MGT',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13,'cmt','COMMENT',200,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14,'row_str','Row',200,'left' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1 ORDER BY SEQ

WITH T1 ( SEQ ,DATA_FIELD ,HEADER_TEXT ,WIDTH ,TEXT_ALIGN ) AS ( SELECT 1,'comd_corp_code','법인코드',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2,'comd_come_code','공법코드',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3,'comd_tabl_id','테이블ID',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4,'comd_colm_id','컬럼 ID',150,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5,'comd_colm_name','컬럼명',150,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6,'comd_sort_numb','순서',40,'right' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7,'comd_data_type','타입',80,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8,'comd_data_leng','길이',40,'right' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9,'comd_colm_algn','정렬',40,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10,'comd_with_scrn','화면출력 넓이',90,'right' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11,'comd_disp_allw','화면출력 여부',90,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12,'comd_updt_date','수정일',80,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13,'comd_init_name','등록자',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14,'chk_yn','CHECK',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15,'desc_yn','DESC',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16,'type_yn','TYPE',100,'center' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17,'cmt','COMMENT',200,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18,'pkcl_str','STR',300,'left' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19,'crt_str','CRT',300,'left' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1 ORDER BY SEQ
